Title: Noblesse Oblige
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Taylor Elmore, Benjamin Cavell, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Jere Burns, Joelle Carter
Plot: Boyd makes the uncomfortable discovery that the man he is trying to rob is very dangerous, and Raylan tries to put the squeeze on Boyd's explosives supplier.
